newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexico Cetes rate reverses gains, ends down.
newsitem.headline: Mexico Cetes rate reverses gains, ends down.

text.p: Mexican overnight Cetes rates reversed early increases to close down 80 basis points at 17.20 percent.
Dealers said early pressure from one big player with a heavy liquidity position was swayed in late trade by another player with a glut of paper.
"There's some one with all the cash and some one with all the paper, and they're speculating between them," a trader said.
Dealers said secondary rates had also zigzagged in step with U.S. long bond yields.
